column1: Weighted MRI size (256, 128, 1) in T2, showing the skull of a person a man of 37 years old, of axial section n°84 starting from the base of the skull. The observed details include: the cortex of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 164.7949 mm³, the white matter of left hemisphere of cerebellum of volume 371.7773 mm³, the left cerebellar cortex of volume 1845.7031 mm³, the fourth ventricle of volume 9.2285 mm³, the brainstem of volume 373.0957 mm³, the cortex of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 255.7617 mm³, the white matter of right hemisphere of cerebellum of volume 511.5234 mm³ and the right cerebellar cortex of volume 1723.0957 mm³.
